title: Home
welcomeText:
# Trusted Accessibility & Remediation Services

Trusted Accessibility & Remediation Services

Our services encompass a wide array of accessibility remediation services for publishers, tailored for both print and digital materials. This includes:

• NIMAS conversion incorporating MathML 3.0,

• Remediating Accessible PDF/UA,

• Remediating Google Docs, and 

• Accessibility Audits for LMS and Websites 

…in alignment with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines WCAG 2.x AA and Section 508 standards.
seoDescription: A11Y - NIMAS Master: Trusted Accessibility Remediation Services
